channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description: I've searched everywhere and cant find a certain guide on how to remove in game name titles, on my client everytime I talk it looks like "<GoldCrown> Main Owner: (Character name)". Anyone have any clue on how to remove the "Main Owner" and just leave it as "<GoldCrown> (Character Name)". Thanks.

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Creative I:

I’ve searched everywhere and cant find a certain guide on how to remove in game name titles, on my client everytime I talk it looks like " Main Owner: (Character name)". Anyone have any clue on how to remove the “Main Owner” and just leave it as " (Character Name)". Thanks.

search the client and server for “Main Owner”

Read full topic
